subject: Horse Racing
American Pharoah (Race Horse)
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Horses
Preakness Stakes
lead_paragraph: American Pharoah, a gentle horse, is unnerved by big crowds, an unfortunate Achilles’ heel to have during Triple Crown season, when races attract over 100,000 people.
snippet: American Pharoah, a gentle horse, is unnerved by big crowds, an unfortunate Achilles’ heel to have during Triple Crown season, when races attract over 100,000 people.
